divs: Sighting DetailsTward the end of the Movie, Thelma and Louise Blow Up a Truck, then Leave the Freeway and are chaxed By the Police. During this Chase, in the upper right hand of the screen, for about a 3 or 4 second glimpse, you will see 10 to 15 spherical objects in the sky. I have been seeing UFOs in other movies also, I can't help but watch the sky during movies for a glimps of a UFO.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Lewistown
There was one other sighting in Lewistown on or around September 18th 2000
